body_html: I find that it will still download the latest version of flatbuffers if I simply checkout to r1.8 branch of the tensorflow repository. To download the 1.8 version of flatbuffers, I should go to [https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/tree/v1.8.0](the flatbuffers repository). Then, I can build without error. Thanks @davlhd .
